text: Big Tech to Spend $650 Billion This Year as AI Race Intensifies - Bloomberg.com

text: Court records: Chicago immigration raid was about squatters, not Venezuelan gangs - NPR

text: Statins don’t cause most of the side effects on package warnings, study finds - statnews.com
fullText: Many people who should be taking statins avoid them for fear of side effects. A large new study says most of those side effects don't actually show up.
